description:
A first year student who was working as a rental girlfriend in her free time.
Her real name is Ichinose Chizuru. After the incident with Kazuya, she realised he is her neighbour at the apartment complex and also goes to the same college. She is aiming to be an actress with inspiration from her grandmother. The main reason she became a rental girlfriend is for developing her acting experience.
name: Mizuhara Chizuru
